title: The Story of the Holy Knight Who Lost His Virginity Because His Rival’s Interrogation was Too Naughty - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Naive Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Rivalry   Seduction   Short Story
author: Ebi Ebiko   海老エビ子
description:
The Holy Knight Luciel Mel-Yard was bored.　

It had been a whole day since he was put under house arrest in this room without knowing what was going on. The only thing he could do was muscle training. It was Cavan Rossina, the deputy magician of the royal palace, and also Luciel’s rival, who told him what was going on. 

According to Cavan, Luciel was suspected of having committed adultery with a nobleman’s daughter.

It was an awful scandal for a holy knight who had to be a virgin.

“In honor of the Holy Knight who has stood high, I will personally interrogate him with great care and attention.”

In this way, the Holy Knight Luciel was to undergo the naughty physical examination of the Magician Cavan.>
